title: Ryan Lonergan
text:
Ryan Lonergan (born 6 April 1998) is an Australian <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> footballer who plays for the <a href="Brumbies">Brumbies</a> in <a href="Super%20Rugby">Super Rugby</a>.
In 2016, Lonergan was selected for the <a href="Australian%20Schoolboys%20rugby%20union%20team">Australian Schoolboys rugby union team</a> in a tour of New Zealand and Samoa.
Lonergan played for the <a href="Australia%20national%20under-20%20rugby%20union%20team">Australia national under-20 rugby union team</a> in the <a href="2017%20Oceania%20Rugby%20Under%2020%20Championship">2017 Oceania Rugby Under 20 Championship</a>.
Soon after leaving school in 2016, Lonergan was signed to a two-year contract.
Lonergan made his Super Rugby debut in 2017 in a match against the <a href="Chiefs%20%28rugby%20union%29">Chiefs</a> in <a href="Hamilton%2C%20New%20Zealand">Hamilton, New Zealand</a>.
